name: Swing Heaven
address: Jl. Tangga Yuda, Bongkasa, Kec. Abiansemal, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80352, Indonesia
review 1: The admission and dress rental fees at this location were a bit higher compared to other places, but it was justified by the fact that you only needed to purchase one ticket for unlimited access to all the nests, swings, and photo spots. Additionally, they had a dedicated team of staff members who were ready to capture your moments at every location. What's more, there was a helpful lady in the dressing room who assisted me in styling the rental dress to my liking. The absence of long lines made the experience even more enjoyable, and I can confidently say that every penny spent was well worth it.The photos taken at this place turned out to be some of my absolute favorites from the entire trip, and I have absolutely no regrets about choosing to visit this location. The convenience of having all the attractions included in one ticket, the professional staff members ready to capture memories, and the assistance provided in the dressing room all contributed to making this experience truly unforgettable. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking to create lasting memories in a hassle-free environment.
review 2:
Great location for pictures and amazing staff. I went on a weekday around 10:30am

The price seems hefty for a photo spot, but they have so many staff around to ensure you‚Äôre safe, not waiting too long as they guide to different spots and each spot has someone attending to it so the price makes sense.
They really make an effort to take the best pictures/videos and are so kind! If you‚Äôre not into taking photos, there‚Äôs nothing else here for you.

You also get a welcome drink.

No queue for entry, but about 5min wait for some picture spots. There was about 8+ photo spots and 3 swings. 1 swing is really big and fast.
review 3:
This place is amazing.
The staff are welcoming and friendly, and the whole place is incredibly organised.
If you're scared of heights, then this may not be your favourite place. However, there were plenty of options for photos and videos without getting on the swings, so it really does cater for all.
The views are absolutely stunning, and included in the cheap entry fee, is lunch, which was very tasty indeed, and there was lots to choose from.
The restaurant there also caters to those who wish to buy their lunch separately, and there is a good selection of food, drinks, sweets, and ice creams.
This place was easy to get to by car and very reasonably priced.
I am really looking forward to returning here again, and I would highly recommend it for all ages.
review 4: This place had slightly higher admission and dress rental prices than others because you buy one ticket for full access to all nests/swings/photo attractions, and they have a complete set of staff to take your photos at each site. They even had a lady in the dressing room to help me style my rental dress however I would like it. No lines, and WELL worth the money! These are some of my favorite photos from the trip and I have zero regrets!!
review 5: True HEAVEN. We were accompanied by cacink through the entire tour. He took amazing photos and videos with his phone. Truly unbelievable service. If you ever visit here, ask for him. You will not be disappointed. The dresses are available for rent for an extra cost, worth it for the photos

name: Desa Swing Bongkasa
address: Jl. Tangga Yuda, Bongkasa, Kec. Abiansemal, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: We were debating which swing to go to, and I am SO glad we chose Desa Swing. No crowd, way cheaper, BEAUTIFUL views, and incredible staff. They took a million photos, gave us guidance on poses, and made the experience so much fun. I would highly recommend this place !!
review 2: Amazing view with all kinds of settings üòç Love that the crews were so helpful with your poses and dress! Definitely recommend to rent the dress as well ü´∂üèª 10/10 experience
review 3:
Amazing experience, Dewi satyahati very calm and sweet we love her hospitality such a nice and kind person. Guys as per my personal experience visit this place for all the swings adventure in Ubud, bali you won‚Äôt regret.

Wonderful time üëçü•≥
review 4:
A small tip before the review- For all swings and nest, they will charge you 450K IDR per person, but if you choose to book (at spot or in advance) from Klook the same will cost you only 217K IDR. Irrespective of your medium of booking, if you want dress for ladies/girls, it is going to cost you 200K per person and personal photographer with DSLR camera will cost you another 200K. Not only that, for taking photo at the Temple Gate/Door structure they have built on the premises is again chargeble at 100K per person.
Pros: 1. There wasn't any waiting as it was very less crowded. Hardly 10 couples were there. Your time will be utilized effectively.
2. The staff at the swings were joyful, friendly and helpful in taking photos with phone. They know the tricks and do it well. ü§´
3. When we reached it was raining, hence the office staff advised to wait for the rain to stop before making the payment/booking.

Cons: 1. The area they have is very limited
2. A bit aged lady (appeared as the owner) was there who didn't seem to be very customer friendly.
3. Their washrooms need cleaning
review 5: at first a little pessimistic and it was ultimately a great time as the people who work there do everything possible to provide you with the best photos possible! superb spot I recommend!

name: Dtukad Adventure Club Bali
address: Jl Raya Bongkjasa Banjar Sayang Agung, Bongkasa, Kec. Abiansemal, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80354, Indonesia
review 1: Stay away from this place as they keep 2 civet cats in the smallest cage and then sell the luwak coffee in their menu. Poor animals were sleeping together in a corner of the cage, probably terrified. People who buy this coffee just because is cool should think twice  before doing so. Businesses like this should be investigated and fined for how they treat animals.
review 2: The rafting track is beautiful and the prices are good after negotiation, but the swings are overpriced, so you have to negotiate the price if you want to try it.
review 3: Cliff side day club with infinity pool overlooking ayung river  valley. Food, service and view way better than its sister club that have the same name around saba bali
review 4: The concept is terrific, the food and beverage was commendable, the swimming pool is nice. However, maintenance seems neglected, the place need to be tidied up a lot especially the facilities like toilet and changing room. The music's beat also often not in harmony with the supposed to be zen atmosphere. Overally an interesting getaways, alone or with loved ones. After a tidy up and maintenance, this place will be terrific.
review 5: Best place for Bali swing..... Awesome staff.... We really had a great time.....

name: BALI ALASKA SWING
address: banjar sayan tua, Bongkasa, Kec. Abiansemal, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80352, Indonesia
review 1: This place offers you more affordable service. Not to mention staffs there are supper friendly to us. Recommend for everyone who wants to enjoy amazing view
review 2: Beautiful swing to take photos with your family. It is 100% safe and is an amazing view. You can take photos and swing. The people there take photos on your phone for you or you can hire the photographer and pay for the pictures. Very good experience and was located in a village.
review 3:
It is a good place to play with warm and hospitality of the service.
We can play in rafting,swing,play with the very familiar big and small dogs and we can eat for lunch,brunch in traditional frying duck,porkribs and manything all you can eat.
review 4: VW fun ride after swing and rafting at Alaska
review 5: Beautiful location for selfies.  When I went, I was the only person there.  They didn't have dogs there, because of Coronavirus....bummer!   I had pizza...it was okay... nothing special.  When I got the bill they charged me an extra 50,000 entrance fee.   I was not happy about that!  I don't mind paying, but I didn't like being charged when I'm about to leave.  I saw no sign and they didn't ask me or inform me of the entrance fee.  Greeters should ask for fee or tell you of the fee when you first walk in.   They have some nice swings.  They wanted 300,000 for the swing, so declined.   I can find other swings for a much lower price, especially during the pandemic.

name: Bali jungle swing
address: Bongkasa, Abiansemal, Badung Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Bali jungle swing, is a comfortable and beautiful place. The staff are very friendly, they direct you to pose and take videos or photos.

To go here only takes 15 - 20 minutes from Ubud. Through beautiful rural roads.

Staff , Very professional in taking videos & photos

Food, very delicious, especially the grilled ribs and duck.

The place is flat, making it easier for you to access every swing and sports photo. For those of you who want to come here, don't ever hesitate. No need to queue and no need to hesitate anymore.

Note ; This place can be booked to have dinner with your friends, if you have an event planned.

The full moon is the most beautiful point in this place. Hopefully this review is useful for you.
review 3: Cool place to get amazing experience
review 5:
Best place for taking photos.

But there are lots of other places for Bali swing.

The main issue we faced was the food.  Food was included but we didn't take that since there are no Indian food.  So we requested them to provide at least 2 coconuts for the replacement of Lunch.  But they charged us 60k for that and that was not acceptable.

So better Please check other locations,  before you select here..

name: Puri Banyuning Bongkasa
address: F6WM+5Q2, Bongkasa, Abiansemal, Badung Regency, Bali 80352, Indonesia
review 1: One of the most beautiful places to visit with a lush garden and beautiful architecture. It's a great place to soak in the local culture and history. Wonderful ambiance and is worth a visit!
review 2: A gorgeous royal palace at Bongkasa village. Balinese architecture building, a lush green garden is a great place to see the original ancient palace. the Balinese community are friendly and this palace is perfect for group dinner. Is recommended for sightseeing places to see a Balinese village with its own lifestyle.
review 3: Extremely beautiful place with a gorgeous garden!
review 4: Beautiful Balinese Royal Palace in a tranquility village.
review 5:
The river guide is very humble and in a good communicatte, i lke the river guide guy hia name is liyong, also the adventure is awesome!!! Keep up the good work

Nb: the food and the swing atrraction is awesome too

name: Raji's House
address: F6WR+R9X, Jl. Blumbang, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Villa Rumah Kebun
address: Jl Mahessa, Banjar Tanggayuda, Bongkasa, Kec. Abiensemak, Kabupaten Badung, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
Best Place to enjoy a quite getaway and perfectly located to reach every sight Bali has by motorbike.

Two motorbikes available to rent, a private pool, a nice rooftop and a few cute dogs made me stay there forever and I loved it.
Although it is surrounded by jungle it is always perfectly cleaned up and the staff is super friendly.

I hope you enjoy it as much as I did!
review 2: nice villa and comportable holiday i like it
review 3: Nice place if u want to be quiet

address: Jl. Kedewatan, Bongkasa, Kec. Abiansemal, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80352, Indonesia

Very good guesthouse.  The owner is very nice.
Amazing area.
We really loved our trip.
